category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_load_unconfigured_displayed_bomlines
preference.preference_description: TRUE : all parts and products with Variant and Effectivity Conditions are loaded, when used in conjunction with the following menu options: All parts and products containing Effectivity Conditions are loaded when the Show Unconfigured by Occurrence Effectivity menu option is activated. Parts/products that do not contain Effectivity conditions will not be loaded and display a broken icon. All parts and products containing Variant Conditions are loaded when the Show Unconfigured Variants menu option is activated. Parts/products that do not contain Variant Conditions will not be loaded and display a broken icon. FALSE : parts and products containing Variant and Effectivity Conditions are never loaded and display a broken icon
